# TASK::TASK_COWER

## Summary
Gives the ped a cower task

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **INT** time = -1

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Not approved for use in network scripts
